overview: Dressed in sultry white lingerie with her long brown hair flowing around her shoulders, Karina White slides her fingertips across her soft skin as she waits for her man to join her in the living room. • Mary Jane Johnson and her husband Jake show us that married life is full of sexy spontaneity! • Fiery redhead Faye Reagan awakens after a night of passion spent with her new lover Giovanni to a kiss that soon turns into more. • Dressed in a sheer leotard that hugs her slender body, Violet struts into the room where Van Wylde awaits her massage skills. • After days apart, Ash Hollywood is reunited with her man Seth Gamble and now that they have come together again they find that they are insatiable.
title: Amber Morning
